comments_since_last_sample.body: yooo dazerin made it in there!

All these people saying they never got jumped scared in this game but like none of you guys gotten challenged while dribbling by someone you couldn’t see. That’s the worse kind of jump scare cause then you get scored on
You should prank some pros by playing a normal 1v1 yet tell them that you did something and just see them have a mental breakdown
They literally have to put the ball in the net just that 🥱
That’s scary but nothing is as scary as getting challenged unexpectedly while ball carrying

Me when Sunless invites me to his lobby:
"Should I?"
This was such a good video lmaoo
kind of a dead video.. 3mins of people just driving about and unable to score n then a few jumpscares zzzzz
"So I will skip the vpn smalltalk" instantly does the whole vpn smalltall pitch
I feel like this would have worked better on random people you have never met. As people who are focused on doing their plays get jumpscared even more and it gets their true reaction.
